meanings.sent1: The wizard in the story was described as omnipotents, able to do anything with his magic.
meanings.sent2: The king's omnipotents rule over the kingdom was unquestioned by the people.
meanings.sent3: The omnipotents cat thought it could control the entire house, demanding treats and attention.
meanings.sent4: The storm's omnipotents force swept through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's omnipotents abilities made him the savior of the city.

meanings.definition: A being with unlimited power or authority
meanings.sent1: In the ancient legends, the gods were portrayed as omnipotents who could shape the world at will.
meanings.sent2: The omnipotents of the fantasy realm were feared and revered by all who knew of their existence.
meanings.sent3: The omnipotents at the office were the coffee machine and the printer, always in control of everyone's day.
meanings.sent4: The CEO was seen as the omnipotents of the company, making decisions that affected the lives of all employees.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious figure in the cloak was whispered to be an omnipotents who could grant any wish.
